Package org.terrier.applications.secondary

Contains additional applications-level programs that provide easy access to additional functionality within Terrier

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CollectionEnrichment
    Provides a simple method to get a set of expansion terms and weights for a given query and index.

Package org.terrier.applications.secondary Description

Contains additional applications-level programs that provide easy access to additional functionality within Terrier
